name: Goblin Slayer (TigerPixel)
description:
Pre-alpha of Goblin Slayer Game ver. 0.5

What is done:

ENEMIES:

GOBLIN (life points: 5)

ORC (life points: 15)

 GOBLIN SPLITTER (life points: 70) - splits acid

 SKELETON (life points: 20)

  NECROMANCER (life points: 200) - spawns skeletons

TWO HEADED GIANT {BOSS} (life points: 1000)

OGRE (life points: 100)  JUMPER  TENT - GOBLIN SPAWNER (life points: 200)

LEVELS:

CITY (your hub, no enemies, you will impove your weapon and get to other levels from here)

8 forest levels (first one at the beginning, and 7 others after reaching CITY)

10 arena levels

UNDERGROUND (level at graveyard)

SURVIVAL MODE:
